Question: Rising Craft Co.,Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Rising Craft Co.,Ltd.

Product 1: Brain Science-Based Digital Therapeutics Software

 - Utilizes XR (Extended Reality) technology

 - Focuses on rehabilitating visual mechanisms of the brain

 - Pioneers in the digital therapeutics field
Summary_cn:
